DOC.brief_summary: Patellofemoral Pain Syndrome ( PFPS ) , also know anterior knee pain , one common musculoskeletal disorder . Most patient suffer knee pain long time . The aim study investigate short-term effect Mobilization movement Kinesiotaping pain , function balance patient PFPS .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Effects Mobilization With Movement Kinesiotaping Patellofemoral Pain Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Patellofemoral Pain Syndrome one common musculoskeletal problem world . It 's incidence also become high people knee pain suffer long time . In treatment PFPS , conservative treatment method prefer prior surgical one . When literature review , study Mobilization movement ( MWM ) method use effect show compare ( Kinesiotaping ) KT find far respect treatment PFPS . Thirty-five female patient diagnosed unilateral PFPS randomly assign 2 group . The patient first group ( n=18 ) receive two technique Mobilization movement intervention Kinesiotaping apply group ( n=17 ) . Both group treat exercise . All patient receive 4 session treatment twice week period 2 week follow accordance 6-week-home exercise program . Primary outcome : pain severity , knee range motion , hamstring flexibility , physical performance ( 10-step stair climb test , time go test ) , Kujala Patellofemoral Pain Scoring Y-Balance test assess .
DOC.criteria: knee pain least 3 month 3 point accord visual analog scale comply rehabilitation patient want finish want complete study , exclude meniscus , bursa , ligament , patellar tendon lesion , patellofemoral dislocation and/or recurrent subluxation , undergone low extremity surgery
